item.title: Using the new AI template to create a chatbot about a website
item.description: In this post I use the new Microsoft's new .NET AI template to ingest the contents of a website and create a chatbot that can answer questions with citations Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/using-the-new-ai-template-to-create-a-chatbot-about-a-website/
